text: Miles Edgar Agar (June 13, 1858 – May 25, 1944) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Saint John City from 1925 to 1935. ==References== Category:1858 births Category:1944 deaths Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:People from Saint John, New Brunswick Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Miles E. Agar
